node.title: LA mall latest to be hit by smash-and-grab thieves
node.alt: A security guard stands outside the Nordstrom store at The Grove retail and entertainment complex in Los Angeles
node.description: A group of thieves are pursued by police after smashingÂ windows at a department store, in the latest in a trend of smash-and-grab crimes in California.
node.content:
["A group of thieves have been\u00a0pursued by police after smashing\u00a0windows at a department store in Los Angeles, in the latest in a trend of smash-and-grab crimes.", "The\u00a0group struck around 10:40pm on Tuesday at a\u00a0Nordstrom store at a mall called The Grove, a\u00a0Los Angeles Police Department spokesman said.", "Officers pursued an SUV involved in the crime. The chase ended in South Los Angeles and three people were taken into custody, he said.", "The number of people involved in the crime was not known, the spokesman said.", "The Grove incident followed a weekend of similar smash-and-grab thefts in the San Francisco Bay Area.", "", "
Police seek 80 suspects in flash-mob department store robbery near Oakland.
", "On Sunday in Walnut Creek, San Francisco, about 80 people, some wearing ski masks and wielding crowbars, ransacked a Nordstrom department store, assaulting employees and stealing merchandise before fleeing in cars waiting outside.", "It followed another brazen mob heist of high-end stores on Friday night in San Francisco's Union Square, about 40 kilometres to the west.", "Nordstrom is an American department store chain.", "AP"]
